timeline.body:
Constants should follow the snake-case convention and should be put on top.
Also, this constant's name is a bit meaningless towards what it does, something like `CONFIG_PREFIX` would be more accurate in my opinion.

Here's my suggested change, could you please also move it to the top of the class?

```suggestion
    private static final String CONFIG_PREFIX = "backpacks.";
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Constants should follow the snake-case convention and should be put on top.
Also, this constant's name is a bit meaningless towards what it does, something like CONFIG_PREFIX would be more accurate in my opinion.

Here's my suggested change, could you please also move it to the top of the class?

Suggested change
private final static String backpacks = "backpacks.";
private static final String CONFIG_PREFIX = "backpacks.";
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.body:
Please place that space after the variable.
```suggestion
        this(profile, id, profile.getConfig().getInt(CONFIG_PREFIX + id + ".size"));
```

Please place that space after the variable.

Suggested change
this(profile, id, profile.getConfig().getInt( CONFIG_PREFIX+ id + ".size"));
this(profile, id, profile.getConfig().getInt(CONFIG_PREFIX + id + ".size"));
